item.title: Times Reporters Answer Your Vaccine Questions
item.description: We received hundreds of queries about efficacy, safety, cost and access.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel’s Return Draws 6.2 Million Viewers, Ratings Show
item.description: The first episode of “Jimmy Kimmel Live!” since it was suspended last week by Disney attracted nearly four times as much as its average viewership.

item.title: What to Know About the ICE Shooting, and a Rare Climate Pledge from China
item.description: Plus, how big was Jimmy Kimmel’s first night back?

item.title: What We Know About the Shooting at a Dallas ICE Facility
item.description: One detainee was killed and two others were wounded after a gunman opened fire on Wednesday. The gunman died of a self-inflicted gunshot wound.
